channel.title: leadership on Greg McMullen
channel.description: Recent content in leadership on Greg McMullen

item.title: 2013-2014 Season Recap
item.description: The 2013-2014 season at Rose-Hulman ended better than I ever could have imagined. After breaking more than 20 records in the 2012-2013 season, I never would have imagined breaking another 13. We sent two to the NCAA Division III National Championships. Both swam well and earned All-American status by finishing in the top 8. Personal Challenges This season was easier than last year. From my point of view, I had a very successful season.

item.title: Law of the Lid
item.description: Recently I was given a copy of The 21 Irrefutable Laws of Leadership and decided that I will partake in applying these laws to my life online. My hope is that I can also urge you, my readers and friends, to also partake and keep me accountable for my goals, dreams and ambitions as I also help you. Major Goals List your major goals. No more than ten; no less than five.
